name: Resume
body:
### Yogesh Kumar.
In quest of assignments in Software Development with an organisation of high repute.

```
$ Currently working as Software Engineer (Senior Executive) with HT Media. from November 2012, Experience 2 Years 8 Months.
$ A focussed B.E. (Information Technology) individual with keen interest in subjects such as Software Engineering, Data Structure & Networking.
$ Acquired sound knowledge of Software Languages, Operating Systems, SQL Server, MySQL, Nagios, RRD, SNMP and Internet Applications.
$ Undertaken a Certificate in Developing Enterprise Applications using .Net Framework and XML from NIIT AJMER in year 2007.
$ Successfully attended industrial trainings at ‘Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited, Ajmer’ on ‘Telecommunication Technology’ and at ‘NIIT’ on ‘ASP.Net and AJAX’.
$ Software Engineer with strong analytical, problem solving & organisational abilities.
Effective communicator with good interpersonal skills.
```

Professional and Educational Details .

### PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Organisation	: HT Media (Firefly e-Ventures Limited)	Nov’12 – Continue
Designation	: Software Engineer (Senior Executive)

Role
Web Application Development

### PROFESSIONAL CERTIFICATION
Certificate in Developing Enterprise Applications using .Net Framework and XML from NIIT AJMER in year 2007.

### SCHOLASTICS

Govt. Engineering College, Ajmer (University of Rajasthan) with 65.15%.

D.A.V. Senior Secondary School, Ajmer (Rajasthan Board of Secondary Education) with 60.77%.

10th 												2003
D.A.V. Senior Secondary School, Ajmer (Rajasthan Board of Secondary Education) with 68.83%. 

### PERSONAL DOSSIER

Address		: H.No. 3105/26, New Colony Bhagwan Ganj, Ajmer - 305001.
